Package gov.noaa.messageapi.interfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICollection A collection is a primary dimension of a container.
    IComparisonCondition ComparisonConditions represent value-checking comparisons.
    IComponent @author Ryan Berkheimer
    ICompositeCondition A composite condition is a type of condition that combines other conditions. i.e., 'and' or 'or' are two types of composite conditions.
    ICondition IConditions are filtering tools that can operate on things like IRecords or IRequests.
    IConditionFactory The ConditionFactory interface provides a method for returning an operator for a given condition type.
    IConditionOperator A ConditionOperator provides a method for evaluating a comparison between a given field and condition.
    IConnection An IConnection is an instantiation of an IEndpoint - Connections are provided specific versions of the Endpoint required initialization parameters, and a separate object is created for every Connection in the session manifest.
    IContainer A Container is a primary dimension of a Session.
    IContainerRecord @author Ryan Berkheimer
    IEndpoint An IEndpoint is a user written class that is the terminating point of a given process.
    IField The IField is a fundamental, value-oriented unit in MessageAPI.
    IMetadata Metadata objects hold information related to the parts of some dimension of a Session.
    IPacket IPackets are simple wrapper containers that hold together a list of records and a list of rejections, and provide methods for setting, retrieving, and adding to these contained collections.
    IPluginParser @author Ryan Berkheimer
    IProtocol @author Ryan Berkheimer
    IProtocolRecord ProtocolRecords are one-to-one matches with Endpoint Connections.
    IRecord IRecords are the primary data type of MessageAPI, holding collections (lists) of IFields and IConditions.
    IRejection The IRejection serves as a device for recording what IRecords are rejected during processing, either in filtering, factoring, transformation, or endpoint operations, or otherwise.
    IRequest A Request is the primary method of communicating process streams or batches in MessageAPI.
    IResponse Responses are the processing center and result aggregation repository for requests.
    ISchema @author Ryan Berkheimer
    ISession ISession is the primary container of MessageAPI.
    ITransformation @author Ryan Berkheimer
